details.description: Any utility item consumed while the primer is active will have the same remaining time as the primer, rounded up to the next hour. Does not stack.

19677.name: Gift of Exploration
19677.description: A gift used to create legendary weapons.

19976.name: Mystic Coin
19976.description:
Coins are used to create high level weapons at the mystic forge in Lion's Arch. 
Part of Zommoros' favorite trades.

19980.name: Black Lion Chest Key
19980.description:
This key will unlock one Black Lion Chest containing random Gem Store merchandise, including some rare items not sold separately.

 Black Lion Chests can be found randomly on enemies or bought from the trading post.

19983.name: Mystic Forge Stone
19983.description: Take this stone to the mystic forge to have Zommoros forge something special for you.

19984.name: Bank Access Express
19984.description: Double-click to access your account bank from anywhere. Single use.

19986.name: Black Lion Salvage Kit
19986.description: Double-click then select an item in your inventory to salvage for crafting materials. 100% chance of recovering upgrades. 50% chance to get rarer materials.

19992.name: Instant Repair Canister
19992.description: Double-click to instantly repair broken or damaged armor.

19996.name: Revive Orb
19996.description: Double-click to be revived from death. This will destroy the orb. This item cannot be used in PvP or WvW.

details.description: You recently revived yourself and are still recovering

20000.name: Box o' Fun
20000.description: Double-click to create a box full of random goofs and gags! Lasts 15 minutes.

20002.name: Experience Booster
20002.description:
Grants the following benefits for 2 hours:
• +50% Experience in All Game Types
• +50% PvP Reward Track Gain
• Up to 100% Bonus Experience for Kill Streaks

20003.name: Item Booster
20003.description:
Grants the following benefits for 2 hours:
• +50% Magic Find
• +50% Chance of Critical Crafting Experience Gain
• +33% Chance of Extra Gathering Strike
• 10 seconds of Swiftness after Gathering
• Summons a Black Lion Merchant If Your Inventory Is Full after Gathering (20-Minute Cooldown)

20005.name: Heroic Booster
20005.description:
Grants both Experience Booster and Item Booster benefits for 2 hours:
• +50% Experience in All Game Types
• +50% PvP Reward Track Gain
• Up to 100% Bonus Experience for Kill Streaks
• +50% Magic Find
• +50% Chance of Critical Crafting Experience Gain
• +33% Chance of Extra Gathering Strike
• 10 seconds of Swiftness after Gathering 
• Summons a Black Lion Merchant If Your Inventory Is Full after Gathering (20-Minute Cooldown)

20017.name: Trading Post Express
20017.description: Double-click to summon a Black Lion Delivery Agent for 15 minutes, allowing you and your allies to pick up trading post purchases and profits. Single-use.

20018.name: Merchant Express
20018.description: Double-click to summon a Black Lion Merchant for 15 minutes, allowing you and your allies to access basic supplies and sell loot. Single-use.

20030.name: Hall of Monuments Portal Stone
20030.description: Double-click to travel to the ruins of the Hall of Monuments.

20312.name: How to Dance, Volume 1
20312.description:
This volume teaches you how to perform the "Dodge Step," "Inventory Shuffle," and "Gear Grind" dance moves. You also gain the ability to invite others to follow along in a dance you control.

Double-click to receive these dance skills and the Dancing Spirit buff.

20316.name: Black Lion Chest
20316.description:
Contains a random booster plus two more random items from the Black Lion Trading Company warehouse.
These may include weapon tickets redeemable for unique skins and other rare items not available anywhere else.

20319.name: Endless Mystery Tonic
20319.description: It smells like singed fur and feathers. Use this item to transform in to... something. You'll never know what until you try. The bottle seems to be self-replenishing.

20320.name: Endless Mystery Tonic
20320.description: It smells like some sort of furniture polish. Use this item to transform in to... something. You'll never know what until you try. The bottle seems to be self-replenishing.

20321.name: Endless Mystery Tonic
20321.description: It smells of the forest. Use this item to transform in to... something. You'll never know what until you try. The bottle seems to be self-replenishing.

20323.name: Unidentified Dye
20323.description: Double-click to identify one random dye color, which can be unlocked for all of your characters or recycled at the Mystic Forge.

20349.name: Upgrade Extractor
20349.description: This tool will remove the upgrades from any item, without destroying either the upgrade or the item.

20796.name: Philosopher's Stone
20796.description: Used by the Mystic Forge to change one material into another.

20799.name: Mystic Crystal
20799.description:
Sold by Miyani in Lion's Arch.
<c=@flavor>Zommoros loves crystals.</c>

21119.name: Guild Catapult Blueprints
21119.description: Use to construct a guild catapult build site. It is more powerful than a standard catapult and displays your guild emblem. Range 4,000. Requires 40 supply to complete.

21156.name: Arrow Cart Blueprints
21156.description: Use to construct an arrow cart build site. The arrow cart's primary function is to deal moderate area damage to infantry. Range 2,500. Requires 40 supply to complete.

21157.name: Ballista Blueprints
21157.description: Use to construct a ballista build site. The ballista's primary function is to deal heavy single target damage to siege equipment and infantry. Range 3,000. Requires 30 supply to complete.

21158.name: Catapult Blueprints
21158.description: Use to construct a catapult build site. The catapult's primary function is to deal heavy area damage to walls or moderate damage to gates. Range 4,000. Requires 40 supply to complete.

21159.name: Alpha Siege Golem Blueprints
21159.description: Use to construct an alpha siege golem build site. The siege golem's primary function is to deal heavy damage to gates. Range 225. It is the only mobile siege weapon. Requires 100 supply to complete.

21160.name: Trebuchet Blueprints
21160.description: Use to construct a trebuchet build site. The trebuchet's primary function is to deal heavy area damage to walls, or moderate damage to gates. Range 10,000. Requires 100 supply to complete.

21161.name: Flame Ram Blueprints
21161.description: Use to construct a flame ram build site. The flame ram's primary function is to deal heavy damage to gates. Unable to damage walls. Range 360. Requires 40 supply to complete.

21259.name: Omega Siege Golem Blueprints
21259.description: Use to construct an omega siege golem build site. It is faster and more powerful than the alpha siege golem. Range 1500. Requires 150 supply to complete.

21260.name: Superior Arrow Cart Blueprints
21260.description: Use to construct a superior arrow cart build site. It is more powerful than a standard arrow cart. Range 2,500. Requires 50 supply to complete.

21261.name: Superior Ballista Blueprints
21261.description: Use to construct a superior ballista build site. It is more powerful than a standard ballista. Range 3,000. Requires 40 supply to complete.

21262.name: Superior Catapult Blueprints
21262.description: Use to construct a superior catapult build site. It is more powerful than a standard catapult. Range 4,000. Requires 50 supply to complete.

21263.name: Superior Flame Ram Blueprints
21263.description: Use to construct a superior flame ram build site. It is more powerful than the standard flame ram. Range 360. Requires 50 supply to complete.

21264.name: Superior Trebuchet Blueprints
21264.description: Use to construct a superior trebuchet build site. It is more powerful than a standard trebuchet. Range 10,000. Requires 120 supply to complete.

23045.name: Mystic Salvage Kit
23045.description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 25% chance of rarer materials. 80% chance of recovering upgrades from items.

24502.name: Silver Doubloon
24502.description: Double-click to apply to an item with an unused upgrade slot.

35728.name: Mystic Forge Conduit
35728.description: Double click to open the mystic forge.

35747.name: Cold Potion
35747.description: Double-click to transform into an Ice Elemental.

35748.name: Hard Potion
35748.description: Double-click to transform into an Earth Elemental.

35749.name: Charged Potion
35749.description: Double-click to transform into an Air Elemental.

35750.name: Warm Potion
35750.description: Double-click to transform into an Fire Elemental.

35976.name: Personal Trader Express
35976.description: Double-click to summon a personal Black Lion Delivery Agent for 5 minutes, allowing you to pick up trading post purchases and profits. Reusable.

35977.name: Personal Merchant Express
35977.description: Double-click to summon a personal Black Lion Merchant for 5 minutes, allowing you to access basic supplies and sell loot. Reusable.

35978.name: Permanent Bank Access Express
35978.description: Double-click to access your account bank from anywhere. Reusable.

35987.name: Self-Style Hair Kit
35987.description: Double-click to modify your appearance settings for hair style, hair color, horns, and facial hair. This kit is consumed on accepting a new appearance.

35989.name: Name Change Contract
35989.description: Double-click to change your character name once. The abandoned name will be reserved for you to reclaim on a different character for 24 hours. This item will be destroyed when finished.

35991.name: Total Makeover Kit
35991.description: Double-click to modify your appearance: height, physique, skin color, markings, face, hair, even gender. Race and profession will remain the same. This kit is consumed on accepting a new appearance.

details.description: Movement speed increased by 10%. Stacks duration. Causes sugar crash.

36106.name: Endless Halloween Tonic
36106.description: Double-click to transform into a random Halloween creature for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36172.name: Bobblehead Laboratory
36172.description: Spawn a laboratory that you and your friends can interact with.

36174.name: Musical Bass Guitar
36174.description: Double-click to equip this charr-inspired bass resonator guitar.

36176.name: Endless Riding Clothes Tonic
36176.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36179.name: Endless Common Clothing Tonic
36179.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36180.name: Endless Khaki Clothing Tonic
36180.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36183.name: Endless Designer Hoodie Clothing Tonic
36183.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36184.name: Endless Leather Hoodie Clothing Tonic
36184.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36185.name: Endless Silk Brocade Clothing Tonic
36185.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36186.name: Endless Layered Vest Clothing Tonic
36186.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36187.name: Endless Casual Clothing Tonic
36187.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36188.name: Endless Striped Silk Clothing Tonic
36188.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36189.name: Endless Cherry Blossom Clothing Tonic
36189.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36190.name: Endless Country Lace Clothing Tonic
36190.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36191.name: Endless Ornate Clothing Tonic
36191.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36192.name: Endless Dragon Emblem Clothing Tonic
36192.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36200.name: Endless Casual Hoodie Clothing Tonic
36200.description: Double-click to transform into casual clothes for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

36507.name: Custom Arena Time Token
36507.description: Used to add one day of time to a Custom Arena. Used from your Custom Arena management panel or double-click while playing in any Custom Arena to add time to that arena.

36708.name: Black Lion Chest Key
36708.description: This key will unlock one Black Lion Chest. Black Lion Chests can be found randomly on enemies or in hidden places in the world.

36727.name: Endless Karka Tonic
36727.description: Double-click to become a young karka for 5 minutes.

38115.name: Endless Toymaker's Tonic
38115.description: Double-click to transform into a random Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

38116.name: Endless Toy Ventari Tonic
38116.description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

38117.name: Endless Plush Griffon Tonic
38117.description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

38118.name: Endless Toy Golem Tonic
38118.description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

38119.name: Endless Toy Soldier Tonic
38119.description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

38120.name: Endless Princess Doll Tonic
38120.description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

38121.name: Endless Gift Dolyak Tonic
38121.description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

38128.name: Choir Bell
38128.description: Double-click to pull out a choir bell and play for your friends.

38129.name: Unbreakable Choir Bell
38129.description: Double-click to pull out a choir bell and play for your friends.

38448.name: Ugly Wool Sock
38448.description: Ugly wool socks can be exchanged for other rewards at a Wintersday gift-exchange representative.

38449.name: Ugly Wool Hat
38449.description: Ugly wool hats can be exchanged for other rewards at a Wintersday gift-exchange representative.

38450.name: Ugly Wool Sweater
38450.description: Ugly wool sweaters can be exchanged for other rewards at a Wintersday gift-exchange representative.

38506.name: Permanent Self-Style Hair Kit
38506.description: Double-click to modify your appearance settings for hair style, hair color, horns, and facial hair.

39101.name: Endless Mystery Cat Tonic
39101.description: A faint, feline scent emanates from the bottle. Use its self-replenishing contents to transform into...something.

39711.name: Endless Guild Banner Tonic
39711.description: Transform into your guild's banner for 15 minutes or until hit. You cannot move while transformed.

39715.name: Guild Arrow Cart Blueprints
39715.description: Use to construct a guild arrow cart build site. It is more powerful than a standard arrow cart and displays your guild emblem. Range 2,500. Requires 40 supply to complete.

39717.name: Guild Trebuchet Blueprints
39717.description: Use to construct a guild trebuchet build site. It is more powerful than a standard trebuchet and displays your guild emblem. Range 10,000. Requires 100 supplies to complete.

39752.name: Bauble
39752.description: Spend these in shops inside the Super Adventure Box.

41291.name: Stealth Disruptor Trap
41291.description:
Use to gain a Stealth Disruptor trap. This trap removes stealth from enemies when activated. Costs 10 supply to deploy.
Effect Radius: 1200

41824.name: Continue Coin
41824.description: Grants a player five lives inside the Super Adventure Box. See Moto in Rata Sum for details on how to play.

41886.name: Bauble Bubble
41886.description: A bubble of compressed baubles from Super Adventure Box. Trade these with Moto in Rata Sum.

41911.name: Super Adventure Box o' Fun
41911.description: Double-click to create a box full of random goofs and gags!

42003.name: Guild Ballista Blueprints
42003.description: Use to construct a guild ballista build site. It is more powerful than a standard ballista and displays your guild emblem. Range 3,000. Requires 30 supplies to complete.

42004.name: Guild Catapult Blueprints
42004.description: Use to construct a guild catapult build site. It is more powerful than a standard catapult and displays your guild emblem. Range 4,000. Requires 40 supply to complete.

42403.name: Infinite Molten Berserker Tonic
42403.description: Double-click to drink, transforming you into a Molten berserker for 5 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

42834.name: Supply Removal Trap
42834.description:
Use to gain a Supply Removal trap. This trap removes 5 supply from enemies when activated. Costs 10 supply to deploy.
Effect Radius: 1200

details.description: Any food eaten while the primer is active will have the same remaining time as the primer, rounded up to the next hour. The metabolic primer does not stack.

42888.name: Marriner's Horn
42888.description: Double-click to pull out a horn and play for your friends.

42967.name: Lightning Kite
42967.description: Double-click to take out your kite.

42973.name: Flute
42973.description: Double-click to change your skill bar and play a flute for your friends.

42976.name: Boost Enchantment Powder
42976.description:
Repackages boosts in your inventory to take up less space and allows you to change boosts to another similar type.

Each powder will grant one Enchanted Boost in exchange for the following boosts in the quantity listed in the parentheses:
• Karma Booster (2)
• Experience Booster (1)
• Gathering Booster (1)
• Crafting Booster (1)
• Magic Find Booster (1)
• Killstreak Experience Booster (1)
• Armor Booster (1)
• Strength Booster (1)
• Speed Booster (1)
• Rejuvenation Booster (1)

Double-click to activate.

43076.name: Wind Kite
43076.description: Double-click to take out your kite.

details.description: Movement speed increased by 10%. Stacks duration. Causes sugar crash.

43320.name: Jorbreaker
43320.description: A sweet candy with a hard shell.

43352.name: Infinite Aetherized Tonic
43352.description: Double-click to drink, transforming you into a Aetherblade Cannoneer for 5 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

43487.name: Sun Kite
43487.description: Double-click to take out your kite.

43526.name: Musical Frame Drum
43526.description: Double-click to pull out a drum and play for your friends.

43528.name: Box of Chocolates
43528.description: This box contains chocolates that you can eat or throw for various effects in Costume Brawl.

43766.name: Tome of Knowledge
43766.description:
Grants one character level if below level 80 or one spirit shard if level 80.
Only usable in PvE and WvW.

43881.name: Bottomless Belcher's Bluff Kit
43881.description: Endlessly challenge others to a game of Belcher's Bluff. Double-click to initiate a challenge. <c=@warning>Food and rejuvenation booster buffs will be removed when the game begins.</c>

43901.name: Zephyr Sanctum Model
43901.description: Double-click to view a model of Zephyr Sanctum. Only usable in cities.

43930.name: Guild Kite
43930.description: Double-click to take out your kite.

43956.name: Ellen Kiel Representation Button
43956.description: Double-click to show your support for Ellen Kiel.

43957.name: Evon Gnashblade Representation Button
43957.description: Double-click to show your support for Evon Gnashblade.

43992.name: Black Lion Claim Ticket
43992.description: Take this ticket to a Black Lion Weapons Specialist.

43998.name: Black Lion Claim Ticket Scrap
43998.description: Collect enough scraps to turn in at a Black Lion Weapon Specialist for special weapons.

44602.name: Copper-Fed Salvage-o-Matic
44602.description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 10% chance of rarer materials. 20% chance of recovering upgrades. Requires 3 copper per use.

44637.name: Flames of Kryta
44637.description: Use this torch to find your way in the dark.

44638.name: Hot Air Balloon Souvenir
44638.description: Double-click to pull out a festive balloon.

44640.name: Queen's Gauntlet Entrance Ticket
44640.description: Admit one competitor into a Queen's Gauntlet arena.

44720.name: Infinite Watchknight Tonic
44720.description: Combat Transformation: Double-click to transform into a watchknight. Double-click again to end the transformation.

44883.name: Musical Harp
44883.description:
Double-click to change your skill bar, allowing you to play music for all those nearby.

Cannot be used in combat.

details.description:
100% boost to magic find, WvW rank gain, experience from kills, and gold from kills.
10% bonus to reward track progress.

46499.name: Infinite Continue Coin
46499.description: This coin grants ninety-nine lives when used in the Super Adventure Box's Game Over room. It must be in your inventory to use it, and it can be reused infinitely.

46500.name: World 1 Super Boom Box
46500.description: Double-click to pull out a boom box and play super tunes for your friends. Plays all 5 songs from Super Adventure Box World 1.

46504.name: World 2 Super Boom Box
46504.description: Double-click to pull out a boom box and play super tunes for your friends. Plays all 5 songs from Super Adventure Box World 2.

47897.name: Watchwork Mining Pick
47897.description:
Used to mine all metals. Unlimited uses.

Has a small chance to reward a watchwork sprocket on each swing in addition to mining results.

47909.name: Candy Corn Cob
47909.description: Cobbled together from delicious candy corn.

48825.name: Frost Wasp Logging Tool
48825.description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

48930.name: Consortium Harvesting Sickle
48930.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

48931.name: Chop-It-All Logging Axe
48931.description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

48932.name: Bone Pick
48932.description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

48933.name: Molten Alliance Mining Pick
48933.description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

48934.name: Jack-in-the-Box Scythe
48934.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

48955.name: Dreamcleaver Logging Axe
48955.description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

49133.name: Infinite Toxic Krait Tonic
49133.description: Double-click to transform into a toxic krait. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

49149.name: Royal Terrace Pass
49149.description: Grants access to the Royal Terrace in Divinity's Reach. Double-click to travel to the Royal Terrace.

49277.name: Endless Fractal Tonic
49277.description: It smells like some sort of furniture polish. Use this item to transform into...something. You'll never know what until you try.

49308.name: Thresher-Sickle 5000
49308.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

49424.name: +1 Agony Infusion
49424.description: Double-click to apply to an unused agony-infusion slot. Used by artificers to craft more powerful agony infusions.

49501.name: Tarrktun Personal Delivery Portal
49501.description: Double-click to open a direct link to Tarrktun so you can buy his destabilized ecto.

49930.name: Boxing Gloves
49930.description:
Costume Brawl Toy: Double-click to equip costume brawl boxing skills and boxing attire.
Also known as charr running gloves.

49931.name: Riding Broom
49931.description: <c=@abilitytype>Travel:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle that can change how you move around the world.

49932.name: Enchanted Broom
49932.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

49933.name: Bouquet of Roses
49933.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

49939.name: Frying Pan
49939.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

49940.name: Executioner Axe Toy
49940.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

49941.name: Bloody Prince's Staff Toy
49941.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

49942.name: Pirate Sword
49942.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

49943.name: Scepter of Thorn
49943.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

49948.name: Sonic Tunneling Tool
49948.description: <c=@abilitytype>Travel:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle that can change how you move around the world.

50014.name: Selfless Potion
50014.description: <c=@flavor>For those who put others before themselves in this time of need.<c>

50025.name: Blade Shard
50025.description:
<c=@flavor>Pieces of a sharp blade.<c>

Used in the crafting of Spinal Blade Pack back items.

50040.name: Endless Mystery Quaggan Tonic
50040.description: The aroma of sea breezes and simpler times wafts from the bottle. Use its self-replenishing contents to transform into...something.

50042.name: Endless Blue Quaggan Tonic
50042.description: Double-click to transform into a quaggan for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

50043.name: Endless Pink Quaggan Tonic
50043.description: Double-click to transform into a quaggan for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

50046.name: Endless Black Quaggan Tonic
50046.description: Double-click to transform into a quaggan for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

50047.name: Endless Green Quaggan Tonic
50047.description: Double-click to transform into a quaggan for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

50048.name: Thoughtless Potion
50048.description: <c=@flavor>For those who only thought of themselves in this time of need.<c>

50104.name: Captain's Airship Pass
50104.description:
Gain entry to the Havoc's Heir Airship.

• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.

64734.name: Fancy Winter Crystal Scepter
64734.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

66214.name: Endless Dolyak Calf Tonic
66214.description: Double-click to transform into a dolyak calf for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

66323.name: Musical Lute
66323.description:
Double-click to change your skill bar, allowing you to play music for all those nearby.

Cannot be used in combat.

66342.name: Water Fight Balloon Bucket
66342.description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

66608.name: Pile of Silky Sand
66608.description: Sift through 10 piles of sand for a chance to find something valuable.

66624.name: Zephyrite Lockpick
66624.description:
This key opens a buried locked chest in Dry Top. These chests are only visible during sandstorms.

<c=@flavor>Buried locked chests can contain armor, weapons, rare skins, recipes, ambrite, and more.</c>

66768.name: Endless Monkey King Tonic
66768.description: Double-click to drink, transforming you into the Monkey King for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

66897.name: Prosperity Mine Kite
66897.description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

66898.name: Crystal Shard Kite
66898.description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

66900.name: Ventari Follower Kite
66900.description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

66927.name: Home Portal Stone
66927.description:
Double-click to be transported to your home in your racial city.
Double-click while in your home to return to where you entered from.

66961.name: Birthday Blaster
66961.description: Click to equip the Birthday Blaster.

66999.name: Mawdrey II
66999.description: Double-click to feed 50 Bloodstone Dust in exchange for a gift. Mawdrey II will become full if fed too much dust in a day.

67027.name: Silver-Fed Salvage-o-Matic
67027.description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 25% chance of rarer materials. 80% chance of recovering upgrades from items.

67029.name: Tireless Logging Minion
67029.description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

67030.name: Fused Molten Logging Axe
67030.description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

67032.name: Fused Molten Sickle
67032.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

67063.name: Tireless Harvesting Minion
67063.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

67270.name: Karmic Converter
67270.description: Double-click to trade karma for something useful. Can only buy one item per day.

67280.name: Teleport to Friend
67280.description: Use to teleport to a party member's location.

67348.name: Siege Disabler
67348.description:
Unpack a siege disabler. This trick disables the use of enemy siege equipment for 35 seconds and piloted golems for 20 seconds. Costs 10 supply to deploy. Can be blocked.
Deployment Range: 1200
Effect Radius: 300

67356.name: Magic Carpet
67356.description: <c=@abilitytype>Travel:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle that can change how you move around the world.

67362.name: Endless Bottle of Batwing Brew
67362.description: Double-click to transform into a swarm of bats.

67391.name: Haunted Gramophone
67391.description: Click to equip and use this Halloween themed Haunted Gramophone.

67393.name: Candy Corn Gobbler
67393.description: Use this and 3 of your candy corn for a festive Halloween transform or a random boost.

67394.name: Log-r-Tron
67394.description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

67395.name: Reap-r-Tron
67395.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

67396.name: Mine-r-Tron
67396.description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

67777.name: Bandit Skeleton Key
67777.description: Used to open lost bandit chests in the Silverwastes. Chests can only be found with Silverwastes Shovels.<c=@flavor>Buried locked chests can contain armor, weapons, recipes, ambrite, and more.</c>

67784.name: Endless Dust Mite Tonic
67784.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

67805.name: Endless Arid Devourer Tonic
67805.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

67826.name: Silverwastes Shovel
67826.description: Double-click to equip a shovel specially designed for finding lost bandit chests in the Silverwastes. Use bandit skeleton keys to unlock the chests. <c=@warning>Single-use item.</c>

67835.name: Pact Airship Balloon
67835.description: Double-click to pull out a festive balloon.

details.description:
100% boost to magic find, WvW rank gain, experience from kills, and gold from kills.
10% bonus to reward track progress.

67881.name: Aviator's Memory Box
67881.description:
This fun inventory item spawns a box for everyone to use. Interacting with the box causes everything you see to appear in film grain and extends your arms so you're ready for takeoff!
This item has infinite uses.

Cannot be used in PvP, WvW, or dungeons.

67979.name: Key of Greater Nightmares
67979.description: Used to open a greater nightmare pod in the Silverwastes. The chest is located at the heart of the Hidden Depths.

67981.name: Essence of Nightmares
67981.description: Combine 25 essences with a Bandit Skeleton Key to create a Key of Greater Nightmares.

68046.name: Endless Skritt Burglar Tonic
68046.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

68058.name: Endless Mordrem Husk Tonic
68058.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

68064.name: Endless Mordrem Thrasher Tonic
68064.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

68109.name: Writ of Experience
68109.description: Grants a small amount of experience. Trade 20 writs to Miyani in Lion's Arch for a tome of knowledge.

68110.name: Potion of PvP Reward
68110.description: Grants a small amount of PvP Reward Track progress.

68361.name: Magnanimous Choir Bell
68361.description: A beautiful bell with a glorious sound. This item will bind to your account.

68368.name: Endless Gift Box Tonic
68368.description: Double-click to transform into a Wintersday toy for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

68369.name: Star of Gratitude
68369.description: Double-click to offer 50 empyreal fragments to the Star of Gratitude and receive a gift. The star can take a limited number of fragments each day.

68520.name: Endless Mordrem Troll Tonic
68520.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

68530.name: Endless Mordrem Teragriff Tonic
68530.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

68650.name: Ram Balloon
68650.description: Double-click to pull out a festive balloon.

68799.name: Mad Scientist's Logging Tool
68799.description: Hang on tight! This supercharged tool makes clean cuts through any tree, but it's a wild ride.

68905.name: Mad Scientist's Mining Tool
68905.description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

69478.name: Mad Scientist's Harvesting Tool
69478.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

69887.name: Princess
69887.description:
Double-click to feed 50 dragonite ore in exchange for a gift. Princess will become full if fed too much dragonite in a day.
There's something charming about the way she chitters.

69921.name: Swarm Logging Flute
69921.description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

69958.name: Firefly Mining Flute
69958.description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

70013.name: Mystic Forge Conduit
70013.description: Double-click to open the Mystic Forge.

70044.name: Butterfly Harvesting Flute
70044.description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

70438.name: Fractal Encryption Key
70438.description:
This key will unlock one Fractal Encryption containing bonus items from the fractals!

Fractal Encryptions can be found in the final reward chest of any fractal inside the Fractals of the Mist.

70619.name: Endless Exalted Bastion Tonic
70619.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

70827.name: Pact Crowbar
70827.description: Used to open airship cargo in Verdant Brink. Used automatically on airship cargo in the air. <c=@flavor>Cargo can contain airship parts, crafting materials, armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

70892.name: Vial of Chak Acid
70892.description: Used to open Crystallized Supply Caches. <c=@flavor>Caches can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

70968.name: The Grove Portal Scroll
70968.description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

71416.name: Exalted Key
71416.description: Used to open Exalted chests in Auric Basin.<c=@flavor>Chests can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

71577.name: Divinity's Reach Portal Scroll
71577.description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

71680.name: Endless Mushroom Emperor Tonic
71680.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

71683.name: Endless Chak Slinger Tonic
71683.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

71739.name: Endless Mushroom King Tonic
71739.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

72205.name: Chak Egg
72205.description: Found on chak and in their caches. Can be traded in to Nuhoch vendors for chak weapons.

72210.name: Machete
72210.description: Used to open noxious pods.<c=@flavor>Pods can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

72500.name: Pact Scout's Mapping Materials
72500.description: Double-click to consume. Grants map bonus reward points for your current map when in Central Tyria.

72606.name: Fractal Reliquary
72606.description: Double-click to trade fractal relics for something useful. You can only buy one item per day.

72709.name: Mystic Chromatic Ooze
72709.description: Double-click to coat yourself with your Ooze buddy.

72894.name: Endless Chak Drone Tonic
72894.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

72936.name: Golden Fractal Relic
72936.description: Place four golden fractal relics in the Mystic Forge to receive a gold fractal weapon.

73024.name: Lion's Arch Portal Scroll
73024.description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

73310.name: Endless Mushroom Queen Tonic
73310.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

73577.name: Endless Beetle Tonic
73577.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

73693.name: Mad King's Chest Key Fragment
73693.description:
Combine 3 key fragments to open the Mad King's Chest in the Grand Piazza of Lion's Arch.

<c=@flavor>Gain key fragments by participating in Mad King Says. Only 3 fragments may be earned per day.</c>

73718.name: Ley-Energy Matter Converter
73718.description: Double-click to trade currencies from Magus Falls for something useful. Can only buy one item per tab per day.

73834.name: Fractal Research Page
73834.description: Double-click to combine 28 Fractal Research Pages into 1 Fractal Journal. Fractal Journals can be sold to vendors or used in fractal backpack collections.

74186.name: Endless Spotted Beetle Tonic
74186.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

74323.name: Guild Siege Golem Blueprints
74323.description: Use to construct a guild siege golem build site. It has a lower supply cost than the alpha siege golem. Range 225. Requires 50 supply to complete.

74356.name: Reclaimed Metal Plate
74356.description: Salvaged from reclaimed weapons. Can be traded in to Nuhoch vendors for plated weapons.

74592.name: Superior Shield Generator Blueprint
74592.description: Use to construct a superior shield generator build site. The generator's primary function is to project force fields in order to disrupt enemy movement and support allies. Range 3,300. Requires 50 supply to complete.

74594.name: Endless Chak Zapper Tonic
74594.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

74677.name: Guild Flame Ram Blueprint
74677.description: Use to construct a guild flame ram build site. This ram is more powerful than the standard flame ram and displays your guild emblem. Range 360. Requires 40 supply to complete.

75311.name: Shield Generator Blueprint
75311.description: Use to construct a shield generator build site. The generator's primary function is to project force fields in order to disrupt enemy movement and support allies. Range 2,200. Requires 40 supply to complete.

75636.name: Endless Mushroom Tonic
75636.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

75919.name: Fractal Encryption
75919.description:
This mysterious symbol-covered object contains valuable loot. It will require a Fractal Encryption Key to open.

Fractal Encryption Keys can be purchased inside Dessa's lab in the Mistlock Observatory.

76065.name: Ebonhawke Portal Scroll
76065.description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

76072.name: Nuhoch Warbler
76072.description: Double-click to equip the Nuhoch Warbler to call the Nuhoch scouts.

76174.name: Endless Exalted Caster Tonic
76174.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

76293.name: Rata Sum Portal Scroll
76293.description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

76483.name: Guild Shield Generator Blueprint
76483.description: Use to construct a guild shield generator build site. The generator's primary function is to project force fields in order to disrupt enemy movement and support allies. Range 3,750. Requires 40 supply to complete.

76630.name: Black Citadel Portal Scroll
76630.description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

76827.name: Hoelbrak Portal Scroll
76827.description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

77093.name: Herta
77093.description:
Double-click to feed 250 bloodstone dust in exchange for a gift. Applies 1 stack of Aurillium Plating if used in the Auric Basin. Herta can only absorb a limited amount of bloodstone dust in a day.

The recovered head of this Exalted continues to glow, presumably with consciousness.

77101.name: Endless Nuhoch Tonic
77101.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

77167.name: Endless Nuhoch Crusher Tonic
77167.description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

77568.name: Enchanted Snowball
77568.description: Double-click to encase yourself in snow.

77983.name: Infinite Slubling Tonic
77983.description: Double-click to drink and transform into a slubling for 5 minutes. You are unable to fight while transformed.

78177.name: Permanent Portable Provisioner
78177.description: Double-click to access a portable vendor while in WvW.

78217.name: Endless Repair Canister
78217.description: Double-click to instantly repair broken or damaged armor.

78252.name: Chest of Dungeoneering
78252.description: Double-click to open. Contains a choice of 150 tokens from any dungeon.

78474.name: Black Lion Miniature Claim Ticket
78474.description: Double-click to access a vendor that accepts tickets in exchange for a miniature of your choice. The ticket is consumed after choosing a miniature.

78731.name: Cosmic Mining Tool
78731.description: Used to mine all metals. Unlimited use.

78771.name: Electromagnetic Ascender
78771.description:
Travel. Double-click to equip a bundle that changes how you move around the world.

Using this item automatically equips it while running outside of combat. The effect can be removed by using the Stop Riding skill or by double-clicking this item again.
